item.title: Author profile: Tegan
item.description: Name: Tegan Clark Field: Astrophysics/Climate Science Bio: I’m a 3rd year undergraduate student at the ANU studying Astrophysics but I have a keen interest in climate science and I’m hoping to pursue this further in postgrad study.
